text.名勝負になる舞台は整いましたね: The stage is set for a great game.
text.バ場が乾いているので\\n足元が滑るかもしれませんね: The field is still drying so\nwe could see a few slips.
text.このくらいのバ場のほうが\\n合っているウマ娘もいますからね: The state of the surface suits a few of the\nrunning Uma Musume.
text.このくらい引き締まったバ場ですと\\nスピードに乗りやすいですよ: It's easy to get up to speed on\na firm surface like this.
text.日本のコースは水はけが良いですからね: Japanese courses are very well drained.
text.雨が本格化したら\\n難しいレースになってしまいそうですね: It's going to be a difficult race when the\nrains start in earnest.
text.スピードは出しやすいですが\\n脚への負担が心配です: It's easy to go fast, but I'm worried about\nthe strain on their legs.
text.ここまで重たいバ場だと\\n得意、不得意が出てきちゃいますね: With the field this heavy we're sure to see\nthe different strenghts and weaknesses.
text.かなり苦労するバ場ですね\\nコース取りにも注意です: It's a fairly difficult surface to navigate.\nOne must be careful with their line.
text.こんなに荒れていると\\nレース展開が読みにくいですよ: It's hard to predict the race when it's so\nrough out there.
text.これは相当走りにくそうなバ場状態ですね: This looks like a very difficult place to run.
text.雪がどれだけ影響するか、心配です: I'm worried about how much the\nsnow will affect them.
text.雪も考慮して走らないといけないですね: You have to take the snow into\naccount when you run.
text.雪化粧と言えば聞こえはいいですが\\n走る娘たちにすればやっかいですね: Snow-covered may sound nice, but it's\ntroublesome for our running girls.
text.この雪は敵か味方か\\nウマ娘たちの適性が試されます: Will this snow be helpful or a hindrance? The\ngirl's aptitudes will be tested.
text.気合充分！ いい顔してますね！: She's up for it! Look at that expression!
text.火花散らすデッドヒートに期待しましょう: Let's hope for a sparking dead heat!
text.私が一番期待しているウマ娘\\n気合い入れてほしいですね！: I'm looking forwards to seeing the Uma Musume\nI'm most excited about give it their all!
text.さすがスタートに定評のあるふたりですね: They're both known for their good starts, and\nyou can see why.
text.このスタートの良さが彼女の強さですね: These strong starts are her strength.
text.みんな出方をうかがったのかもしれませんね: Maybe they were all waiting\nto see what would happen.
text.みんな集中してましたね\\n好レースが期待できそうです: Everyone was very focused. I think we can\nexpect a good race.
text.出遅れた娘の巻き返しに期待しましょう: Let's hope the late starting girl\ncan regain her footing.
text.いいライバル関係になりそうですね: It's going to be a good rivalry.
text.まだこれからですよ\\n頑張ってほしいですね！: They've got a long way to go,\nI hope they can persevere!
text.ちょっと厳しい位置ですが\\nここからの巻き返しに期待です: She's in a bit of a tough position, but I'm\nhoping for a turn-around.
text.まだこれからですよ\\nここからの巻き返しに期待です: It's a long way to go. I'm expecting things \nto turn around from here.
text.ちょっと厳しい位置ですが\\n頑張ってほしいですね！: She's in a bit of a tough position but I hope\nshe can hold out!
text.互いに牽制しあっていますからね\\n仕掛けるタイミングで\\n明暗が分かれそうで: They're keeping each other in check. Timing\ntheir moves right will be crucial.
text.緊張感のあるいい展開ですね\\nただ、ペース配分には\\n気を付けたいところでし: Tension rises with this development, but I\nthink they need to be careful with pacing.
text.これは大胆な作戦！\\n完全に予想外でした！: This is a bold move! Completely unexpected!
text.これは大胆な作戦！\\n波乱の展開になりそうです！: And here is a bold move! This\nwill disturb the pack!
text.%h_rank1、\\n彼女の脚質にはあっていますね: %h_rank1, it's a good fit for her legs.
text.この位置なら周囲の様子をうかがえます\\n冷静にレースを進めてますね: From there she can see what happens around \nher She's running this race calmly.
text.これはきっと作戦でしょう\\n彼女には爆発的な末脚があります！: This must be a strategy, her\nlast leg is explosive!
text.最近、近くの神社への\\n恋愛祈願が流行っているらしいですよ: I heard that praying for love at a nearby\nshrine is very popular these days!
text.バ場状態を確認しながら走っている感じですね\\nまだ本気ではないですよ: It's like she's running around checking the\nfield condition. She isn't serious yet.
text.ちょっと掛かり気味かもしれないです\\nひと息つけるといいですが: She looks a little on edge. It would do her\ngood to catch her breath.
text.掛かってしまっているかもしれません\\n息を入れるタイミングがあればいいですが: She may be on edge. You have to find the\ntiming to breathe in again.
text.ちょっと掛かり気味かもしれないです\\n息を入れるタイミングがあればいいですが: She looks a little on edge. Finding a\nbreathing rhythm would do her well.
text.掛かってしまっているかもしれません\\nひと息つけるといいですが: Perhaps she's on edge a little. I hope she \ncan catch her breath.
text.ちょっと苦しいけど大丈夫\\nここからが彼女の実力の見せどころです！: It's a little painful, but that's okay, \nhere's where she shows what she's made of!
text.これだけ密集していると\\nまぎれがありそうですね: When it's this crowded it's easy\nto get caught up in the pack.
text.仕掛けどころの難しいレースになりそうですね: It's going to be a tough race\nto pick your moment in.
text.焦っているみたいですね\\n前との距離が気になるのでしょうか: She seem to be in a hurry, perhaps concerned\nabout the distance to the front.
text.勝負所、最後の直線へと駆けていきます！: The race is on, as they head\nfor the final straight!
text.ちょっと前に出ましたね: It came out a while ago.
text.充分に実力を出せるレースとなりそうですね: It's going to be a race where I\ncan show my full potential.
text.各ウマ娘の好走が期待できます: We can expect a good run from\neach of the Uma Musume.
text.バ場が乾いていますから\\n力のいるレースになりそうですね: The field is dry, so it's going\nto be a race of strength.
text.ダート巧者の実力が\\n遺憾なく発揮できそうですね: I'm sure she'll be able to show off her \nskills as a dirt expert.
text.このふたりのレース運びに注目ですね: It will be interesting to\nsee how these two race.
text.ふたりのペースに\\n後続がどう対応するか注目です: It will be interesting to see how the rest of\nthe field responds to their pace.
text.これは位置取りが熾烈になりそうですね: This is going to be a fierce\nbattle for position.
text.誰が先頭に抜け出すか、注目しましょう: Let's see who slips to the front!
text.ふたりがレースを作りそうですね: It looks like you two are\ngoing to make a race.
text.ハイペースで流れる展開もありえますね: It's possible that the pace will be too fast.
text.直線勝負に賭けているんでしょう\\n終盤に期待です！: I think she's betting on the straight\nand narrow, and we'll see what happens\nat the end of the race!
text.前に抜け出すのは容易じゃなさそうです: It's not going to be easy to get out in front.
text.お互いに牽制し合っているようですね: Looks like they're keeping\neach other in check.
text.各自、自分のペースを保っているようですね: Looks like each of you is\nkeeping your own pace.
text.後方のウマ娘が差し返せるのか\\n気になる開きです: I'm wondering if the horse girl in the back \nof the pack will be able to pull it back.
text.内からくるか、外からくるか！\\n最後の局面です！: It's coming from the inside or it's coming\nfrom the outside! This is the final phase!
text.ウマ娘たちがどう動くか\\n目が離せません！: I can't take my eyes off how the\nUma Musume girls will act!
text.ここからスパート！\\n一気にレースが動きます！: Here comes the spurt! The race is in motion!
text.スタミナを切らさないか心配です: I'm worried I'll run out of stamina.
text.冷静さを取り戻せるといいのですが: I hope she can regain your composure.
text.ダート界のスター誕生を期待したいですね: I'm looking forward to the birth\nof a star in the dirt world.
text.春のスプリント王候補筆頭はズバリこの娘ですね: The top candidate for the Spring\nSprint King is this girl.
text.春の三冠・一冠目を制して\\n実力を証明してほしいですね: I hope she proves her mettle by winning the \nspring Triple Crown and the first crown.
text.トリプルティアラの一冠目を制して\\nみごと桜の女王となってほしいですね: I'd like to see her win the first crown of \nthe triple tiara and become the queen of the \ncherry blossoms!
text.クラシック三冠の一冠目を制する\\n最も「はやい」ウマ娘は彼女かもしれませんね: She may be the 'fastest' horse girl to win\nthe first of the Triple Crown of Classics!
text.現役最強の実力を見せつけて\\n春の盾を手にしてほしいですね: I'd like to see you show off your strongest\ncurrent ability and win the spring shield.
text.新緑の府中で新生マイル王の座を\\n手にしてほしいですね: I'd like to see her win the title of the new\nking of the mile in the fresh green of Fuchu.
text.勝利の女神をあっと言わせる走りを\\n見せてほしいですね: I'd like to see her run in a way that would\nmake the goddess of victory gasp.
text.トリプルティアラの二冠目\\n樫の女王の栄冠を勝ち取ってほしいですね: I'd like to see the triple tiara win the \ncrown of the second Kashi queen.
text.みごと勝利してダービーウマ娘の\\n夢を掴んでほしいですね: I hope she'll win and capture the dream of\nbecoming a Derby horse girl.
text.そのスピードを見せつけて\\n春のマイル王に輝いてほしいですね: I'd like to see her show off her speed and \nwin the Spring Mile King.
text.もっとも多くのファンの夢を背負っていますから\\nみごとグランプリウマ娘に輝いて: She carries the dreams of the most fans\non her shoulders, so I hope she'll win\nthe Grand Prix Uma Musume.
text.人気に応えて秋のスプリント王者の座を\\n掴んでほしいですね: I hope she can live up to her popularity and\ngrab the title of the fall sprint champion.
text.トリプルティアラの三冠目\\nその素晴らしい走りを開花させてほしいですね: I'd like to see Triple Tiara's Triple Crown\nblossom into that amazing run!
text.クラシック三冠路線の終着点\\nここを勝って世代最強を証明してほしいですね: I'd like to see her win this race, the last\nstop on the Triple Crown Classic route, and\nprove that she's the best of her generation.
text.中距離路線の頂点に立つ走りで\\n秋の盾を手にしてほしいですね: I'd like to see her win the autumn \nshield with a run at the top of \nthe middle-distance field.
text.女王の栄冠を掴むだけの\\n実力は充分に持っていますよ: I'm fully capable of capturing\nthe queen's crown.
text.現役屈指のスピードで\\n最強のマイル王に輝いてほしいですね: I'd like to see her shine as the best mileage \nking with one of the best speeds in the world.
text.日本を代表する圧巻の走りを\\n見せつけてほしいですね: I'd like to see her show off her impressive\ndriving skills to represent Japan.
text.ダート最強の走りで\\nみごとチャンピオンに輝いてほしいですね: I hope she will be the best on the dirt and\nwin the championship!
text.来年のティアラ路線に向けて\\n新たな女王の誕生を期待したいですね: I'm hoping we'll have a new queen for next\nyear's Tiara line.
text.来年のクラシック路線を見据えて\\n力を示してほしいですね: I'd like to see her show her strength for the\nclassic route next year.
text.今年最後の大一番で名実ともに\\n最強のグランプリウマ娘となってほしいですね: I hope that she will become the strongest \nGrand Prix horse girl in both name and \nreality in the last big race of the year.
text.クラシック路線につながる\\n大きな一歩を踏み出してほしいですね: I'd like to see you take a big step\ntoward the classic route.
text.上半期ダート路線の総決算\\n王者にふさわしい走りを見せてほしいですね: I'd like to see her show a performance worthy \nof being the champion of the dirt track in \nthe first half of the year.
text.ここ大井で、ダート界の新星誕生を期待したいですね: I'm looking forward to the birth of a new \nstar in the dirt field here in Oi.
text.ダート界のヒロインとして輝く\\n素晴らしい走りを見せてほしいですね: I'd like to see her shine as a heroine\nof the dirt world, and I'd like to\nsee her run a great race.
text.ダート界最速ウマ娘の実力を\\n見せつけてほしいですね: I'd like to see her show off her abilities as\nthe fastest horse girl in the dirt world.
text.ダート路線最強の実力をここで証明してほしいですね: I'd like to see her prove that she's the best\non the dirt track here.
text.暮れの大井で今年のダート路線を締めくくる\\n走りを期待したいですね: I'd like to see her finish the year on the\ndirt at Oi at the end of the year.
text.いい感じに気合いが乗っていますね: You're getting into the spirit of things.
text.レースに気持ちが向いていないですね: I'm not feeling very good about the race.
text.芝のコースで力を十分発揮できそうですね: I think she'll be able to show her full\npotential on a turf course.
text.ダートでパワフルな走りが期待できますね: You can expect a powerful run on the dirt.
text.芝で本領を発揮できるかどうかちょっと不安ですね: I'm a little nervous about whether she'll be\nable to show her true colors on the turf.
text.ダートコースはこの娘にとってはどうでしょうか: I don't know if the dirt track\nwill be good for her.
text.この娘の持久力を見せつけるには絶好の舞台ですよ: It's the perfect stage to show\noff this girl's endurance.
text.王道の距離で好走が期待できますね: You can expect a good run at a royal distance.
text.相性抜群のマイルで\\n素晴らしい走りを期待したいですね: I'm hoping for a great run at a mile, which \nis a perfect match.
text.短距離戦にぴったりの瞬発力がこの娘の持ち味ですよ: She has the kind of instantaneous power \nthat's perfect for short-distance races.
text.この娘にとっては過酷な距離のレースですね: That's a tough distance race for this girl.
text.中距離レースの流れに上手く乗れるかどうか不安です: I'm not sure if I can handle the flow of a\nmid-distance race.
text.マイルのペースが合うかどうか心配ですね: I'm worried about whether or not the pace of\nthe mile will be suitable.
text.短距離の忙しい展開がこの娘に合うでしょうか: I wonder if the busy pace of the short\ndistance will suit her.
text.後方からの豪快な追い込みを見せてほしいですね: I'd like to see her make a powerful\npush from the rear.
text.この娘の鋭い差し脚が炸裂するか、期待しましょう: Let's look forward to seeing if this girl's\nsharp legs will explode!
text.前目につける先行策で勝利をつかんでほしいですね: I'm hoping that she can get ahead of the pack\nand win the race.
text.逃げを打って\\nこの娘のペースに持ち込めれば強いですよ: If we can get away and bring her into her own\npace, she'll be strong.
text.後方待機策だとちょっと届かないかもしれないですね: It might be a little hard to reach\nwith the back-up plan.
text.スパっと切れる差し脚がないので\\nこの作戦はどうでしょうか: I don't have the legs to do it quickly, so \nhow about this strategy?
text.前でレースを運ぶのが上手な娘ではないので\\n少し不安ですね: I'm a little nervous because she's not the \nbest at carrying the race in front of me.
text.ハナを切って\\n冷静にレースを運べるかどうか、心配です: I'm worried about whether or not I can cut \nthe lead and run the race calmly.
text.実力は完全に上位ですね\\n貫禄すら感じてしまいます: She's a top-ranked player, and I can't help \nbut feel her dignity.
text.人気と実力を兼ね備えた、私イチオシのウマ娘ですね: She is both popular and talented, and is one\nof my favorite girls.
text.パドックでも注目を集める素晴らしい仕上がりですね: It's a great finish that draws\nattention in the paddock.
text.1番人気こそ譲りましたが、素質は負けていませんよ: I may have given up the top spot, but I'm not\nlosing any of my qualities.
text.素晴らしい雰囲気を感じる\\n私イチオシのウマ娘ですね: She's one of my favorite Uma Musume, with a\nwonderful atmosphere.
text.1番人気に負けず劣らずいい仕上がりですね: It's as good a finish as the most popular one.
text.3番人気ではありますが\\n逆転を狙える能力を持っていますよ: She may be the third favorite, but she has \nthe ability to pull off an upset.
text.キラリと光るものを持っている\\n私イチオシのウマ娘ですね: She's one of my favorite girls with something\nthat shines brightly.
text.このメンバーの中でも見劣りしない仕上がりですね: The finish is not inferior\nto any of these members.
text.ライバルたちは強力ですが、好走を期待したいですね: My rivals are very strong, but\nI expect them to run well.
text.ちょっと厳しいメンバーですが\\n健闘を期待したいですね: It's a bit of a tough group, but\nI expect them to do well.
text.結果を残すのは難しいかもしれませんが\\n経験を糧にしてほしいですね: It may be difficult to get results, \nbut I hope you can use the experience \nto your advantage.
text.トップスピード・瞬発力ともに\\nいいモノを持っていますね: She has good top speed and \ninstantaneous power.
text.一生懸命走るのですが\\nもう少しスピード感と力強さが欲しいところですね: It runs hard, but it could use a little more\nspeed and strength.
text.長くいい脚を使える持久力がこの娘の魅力ですね: She has the endurance to use her \ngood legs for a long time, and \nthat's what I like about her.
text.推進力と持続力の両立がこの娘の課題ですね: Balancing propulsion and sustainability is \nthe challenge for this girl.
text.最後の直線での粘り強さには\\n目を見張るものがありますね: Her tenacity in the final\nstraight is remarkable.
text.道中のペース配分に気を付けたいですね\\nメンタル面の成長が欲しいです: I'd like to be more careful about how\nI pace myself on the road, and I'd like\nto see some mental growth.
text.このレースに向けてしっかりと仕上がっていますね\\n心身のバランスも非常によく見: You're well-finished for this race, and your \nmental and physical balance looks very good.
text.トモの踏み込みも非常にしっかりしていて\\n良い状態にあると思います: The tomo is very firm and in good shape.
text.人気は少し落としますが\\n体をやわらかく使えているのは好印象ですね: I'm going to lose a little popularity, but I \nlike the way you're using your body softly.
text.どの娘もよく見えるので迷ってしまいますね\\n1人挙げるとしたらこの娘かなと思い: All the girls look good, so I'm not sure \nwhich one to pick.
text.人気薄ですが変わり身があるなと感じるデキですね\\n私イチオシのウマ娘です: She's not very popular, but I feel she has \nthe potential to change.
text.ターフを流れ星のように駆け抜けて\\nその一級品のスピードを証明してほしいですね: I hope she proves her first-class speed by \nrunning like a shooting star across the turf.
text.素晴らしい速さと力強さを併せ持つ\\nマイル路線の一番星はきっとこの娘ですね: With her great speed and power, she must be \nthe star of the mile route.
text.猛者がひしめく王道路線をみごとに制して\\nターフに輝く一等星となってほしいです: I hope she will be the first star shining on \nthe turf by winning the royal road where many \nfierce competitors are gathered.
text.持ち前のスタミナを発揮して\\nいつまでも輝き続ける星のような走りを\\n見せて: I hope she will show her stamina and run like \na star that will shine forever.
text.砂漠の夜空で輝く星のように\\nファンに勇気を与えてくれる走りを期待したいですね: I'm hoping for a run that will give our fans \nthe courage to run like the stars shining in \nthe desert night sky.
text.ゲートに入って\\nどの娘からもいい雰囲気が感じられますよ: Entering the gate, I can sense a good vibe \nfrom every girl.
text.好レースが期待できそうな素晴らしい雰囲気ですね: Great atmosphere for a good race!
text.ゲートでも落ち着いていて好気配ですね\\n素晴らしい走りを期待したいです！: She's calm and composed in the gate, and \nlooking good. We're expecting a great run!
text.この娘もゲートに入って気合いを見せていますよ\\n注目です！: This girl is showing her mettle in the gate \ntoo, attention!
text.優駿の頂点に輝くのはどのウマ娘か\\nトゥインクルスタークライマックス、いざ開幕: Which of the horsema-musume will shine at the \ntop of the championship? The Twinkle Star \nClimax is about to begin!
text.並み居る強豪たちによる好レース\\n一瞬たりとも目が離せません！: The strong field of competitors will not let \nyou out of their sight for even a second!
text.最初にゴールを駆け抜けるのは一体どのウマ娘か\\nさあ、いよいよ発走の時です！: Which horsegirl will be the first \nto run across the finish line? \nNow it's time to get going!
text.栄光のゴールへ向かって\\n各ウマ娘が一斉にスパートを始めます！: All the horsegirls begin their spurt toward \nthe glorious finish line at once!
text.まるで綺羅星のようなウマ娘たちが\\n一気に最終コーナーを駆け抜けていきます！: The horsegirl, like stars of the sky, are all \nrunning through the last corner at once!
text.先行勢の粘り勝ちか、後方待機勢の差しが決まるか\\nいよいよクライマックスです！: The climax of the race is about to begin!
text.この大一番で、みごと一番星のウマ娘らしい\\n走りを見せてくれました！: In this big race, she showed us a run like \nthe star of the race, the horsegirl!
text.スペシャルウィーク！\\n彼女こそが日本総大将と思わせる\\n素晴らしい走りでし: Special Week! She was so good, you'd think \nshe was Japan's general!
text.サイレンススズカ！\\nその走りはまさに異次元の逃亡者たる\\n見事な逃げ切りで: Silence Suzuka! The run was truly a fugitive \nof another dimension, a brilliant escape!
text.トウカイテイオー！\\n皇帝をも超える奇跡の走りを見せてくれました！: Tokai Teio! She has performed a miracle, \nsurpassing even the emperor!
text.マルゼンスキー！\\n他を寄せ付けないその速さは\\nまさにスーパーカーでした！: Marzenski! Her unrivaled speed \nwas truly a supercar!
text.フジキセキ！\\n宝石のように光り輝く走りで\\n私たちを魅了してくれました！: Fujikiseki! She charmed us \nall with her gem of a run!
text.オグリキャップ！\\n誰からも愛されるアイドルウマ娘は\\n誰よりも強い最強のウ: OGURI CAP! The idol horsegirl loved \nby all was the strongest horsegirl, \nstronger than anyone else!
text.ゴールドシップ！\\n黄金の不沈艦と呼ぶにふさわしい\\n豪快な走りを見せてくれ: Gold Ship! She ran a bold race, worthy of \nbeing called the "Unsinkable Ship of Gold!
text.ウオッカ！\\n彼女だけの道を突き進むその姿は\\nまさに常識破りの女傑でした！: Vodka! The way she went her own way, she was \ntruly a woman of extraordinary character!
text.ダイワスカーレット！\\nこの大舞台でも1番は譲らない\\nパーフェクトな走りを: Daiwa Scarlet! She ran a perfect \nrace, not giving up the number \none spot on this big stage!
text.タイキシャトル！\\nその持ち前のスピードとパワフルさで\\n実に豪快な勝利を飾: Taiki Shuttle! With her natural \nspeed and power, she has shown \na very impressive victory!
text.グラスワンダー！\\n頂点を目指して勇往邁進した大和撫子は\\n見事居並ぶ者のな: Grass Wonder! The Yamato Nadeshiko, who \nstrove so valiantly to reach the top, has \nbecome a brilliantly unparalleled Shunsuke!
text.ヒシアマゾン！\\nあらゆる勝負で見せた強く凛々しい姿は\\nまさに女傑でした！: Hsi Amazon! The strong and dignified figure \nshe displayed in every contest was truly a \nlady of character!
text.メジロマックイーン！\\n名門の名を背負う覚悟を胸に\\n強く美しい名優の走りを: Mejiro McQueen! With the determination to \ncarry the prestigious name on her back, she \nran a strong, beautiful, masterful race!
text.エルコンドルパサー！\\n先頭で駆け抜けた怪鳥は\\n世界へも羽ばたく最強の走り:
Elcon d'Orpasar! The monstrous bird 
that ran at the front of the pack, 
showing off its strongest run, flapping 
its wings to the world!
text.テイエムオペラオー！\\n全てのウマ娘を従えて勝利し続けるその姿は\\nまさに世: The mighty TM Operao! The way she continued \nto win with all her horsegirls in tow, she \nwas truly the king of the end of the century!
text.ナリタブライアン！\\n最強としか言い表せないその走りは\\nまさに怪物でした！: Naritabryan! The only way to describe her \nperformance was that she was a monster!
text.シンボリルドルフ！\\n皇帝として君臨するその矜持を\\nみごとな走りで見せてく: Symbol Rudolph! She showed her pride of being \nthe reigning emperor with a magnificent run!
text.エアグルーヴ！\\n女帝として追い求めるその理想を\\n素晴らしい走りで見せてく: Airgroove! She showed us the ideals \nshe pursues as an empress, and \nshe did it wonderfully!
text.アグネスデジタル！\\n数多の戦場を駆け抜けたその姿は\\nまさに勇者の姿そのも: Agnes Digital! The figure that ran \nthrough so many battlefields was \nthe very image of a brave man!
text.セイウンスカイ！\\n晴天に浮かぶ雲のように掴めないその走りは\\nまさしくトリ: Seiun Sky! That run, as elusive \nas a cloud floating in clear skies, \nwas truly a trickster!
text.タマモクロス！\\n稲妻の如き一閃の走りで\\nその驚異的な実力を見せてくれまし: Tamamo Cross! With a flash of lightning, \nshe showed us her phenomenal ability \nto run like lightning!
text.ファインモーション！\\n勝利という何物にも代えがたい栄光を\\nレースという世: Fine motion! We have won the irreplaceable \nglory of victory in the world of racing!
text.ビワハヤヒデ！\\n自らの「勝利の方程式」を完成させ\\n世代最強の実力をここで: Biwa Hayahide! She has completed her own \n"winning formula" and has proven herself to \nbe the strongest of her generation!
text.マヤノトップガン！\\nその類まれな才能を発揮し\\n天衣無縫で最強の走りを見せ: Mayano Top Gun! She showed her exceptional \ntalent, and ran her strongest ever!
text.マンハッタンカフェ！\\n漆黒を切り裂くような走りで\\n摩天楼の頂点たる実力を: Manhattan Cafe! With a run that cut through \nthe jet black, she proved she is the best of \nthe best in the skyscraper!
text.ミホノブルボン！\\nサイボーグのごとく正確無比な走りで\\n最高の成果を見せつ: Mihono Bourbon! She ran like a cyborg \nwith unmatched precision, showing \nus her greatest achievement!
text.メジロライアン！\\n名門の名に恥じない決意と鍛錬のたまものを\\nその力強い走: Mejiro Ryan! She proved that her \ndetermination and training have earned her a \nprestigious name with her powerful run!
text.ヒシアケボノ！\\nその大きな大きなスケールの走りは\\n大きな栄光をも掴んでみ: HISHI AKEBONO! That big, big scale run has \nalso brought her great glory!
text.ライスシャワー！\\nどんな大舞台でも己を貫く走りは\\nまさに最強のヒーローで: Rice Shower! The way she carried herself on \nany big stage, she was truly the strongest \nhero of them all!
text.アイネスフウジン！\\nまさに風のように駆け抜ける走りで\\n見事栄冠を掴んでみ: AINES FUJIN! She ran like the wind, and she \nwon the crown!
text.アグネスタキオン！\\nまるで幻を見るような超光速の走りで\\n見事私たちの夢を: Agnes Tachyon! She made our dreams \na reality with her super-lightning \nspeed that was like a vision!
text.アドマイヤベガ！\\n誰よりも強い覚悟を胸に\\n一等星の名にふさわしい走りを見: Admire Vega! With a determination stronger \nthan anyone else's, she showed us a run \nworthy of the name "First Class Star!
text.イナリワン！\\n粋でいなせなその走りで\\n天下無双の実力を私たちに知らしめま: Inari One! She makes known her peerless \nstrength with an exquisite, gallant run!
text.ウイニングチケット！\\n大舞台にかける強い想いで\\n世代の旗手たる実力を見せ: Winning ticket! With a strong desire to make \nit to the big stage, they showed that they \nare the standard bearers of their generation!
text.エアシャカール！\\n自ら導き出したロジックを携え\\n誰もが認める最強の走りを: Air Shakur! She's forced everyone here to \nacknowledge her own logic with that \nawesome run!
text.エイシンフラッシュ！\\n誇りと意志を胸に\\n自ら旨とする完璧なレースを披露し: Eishin Flash! With pride and determination, \nshe ran a perfect race, as she always does!
text.カレンチャン！\\nその閃光のごとき速さで\\n誰をも魅了する素晴らしいレースを: Curren Chan! She was as fast as a flash, and \nshe had a great race that captivated everyone!
text.カワカミプリンセス！\\nみごとライバルをねじ伏せ\\n姫たる証の勝利を掴み取り: Kawakami Princess! She has successfully \ndefeated her rivals and captured the victory \nas proof of her status as a princess!
text.ゴールドシチー！\\n自らレースに賭ける思いの強さを\\n揺るがぬ意志と自らの脚: Gold City! She proved with her unshakable \nwill and her own legs how strong \nher bet on the race was!
text.サクラバクシンオー！\\n猪突猛進で突き進むその走りは\\nまさに驀進王の名の通: Sakura Bakushin O! Her dash and rush was just \nlike her name, the king of dash and rush!
text.スイープトウショウ！\\n一瞬の切れ味を爆発させる\\nまるで魔法のような走りを: Sweep Tosho! With a sudden explosion as if \nthis were a magic show!
text.スーパークリーク！\\nその持ち前の器量と才気で\\nあらゆるライバルをリードす: Super Creek! She has proven her ability to \nlead all her rivals with her natural ability \nand brilliance!
text.スマートファルコン！\\n見る者の視線を一身に集める走りで\\nみごとトップに上: Smart Falcon! She has captured the hearts and \nminds of everyone watching and has risen to \nthe top of the standings!
text.トーセンジョーダン！\\n決して揺るがぬ勝負根性で\\n誰にも崩せない不滅の走り: TOSEN JORDAN! She never wavered in her \ndetermination to win, and she showed us an \nimmortal run that no one can break!
text.ナリタタイシン！\\n世代随一のスピードを存分に見せつけ\\n大舞台でその実力を:
Narita Taishin! The fastest of 
her generation, she showed her 
speed to the fullest and proved 
her ability on the big stage!
text.ニシノフラワー！\\n可憐ながらも勇気を与えるその走りで\\n大輪の花を咲かせて: Nishino Flower! She made a big bloom with her \ndainty but courageous run!
text.ハルウララ！\\n決して諦めない不屈の精神で1着を掴んだその姿は\\nまさに春爛: Halulaura! The way she grabbed first place \nwith an indomitable spirit that never gives \nup was truly springtime!
text.マチカネフクキタル！\\n自らの力を信じたその走りで\\nみごとに福を呼び込んで: Machikanefukukkitaru! She ran with faith in \nher own strength and brought in good fortune!
text.メイショウドトウ！\\n確かに芽生えた自信を胸に\\n覇王をも超える最高の結果を: Meishoudou! With the confidence that has \ncertainly grown in me, I have obtained the \nbest result, surpassing even the High King!
text.メジロドーベル！\\n名家のウマ娘である強い意志を胸に\\n素晴らしい走りを見せ: Mejiro Dobel! With the strong will \nto be a horsewoman of a great family, \nshe ran a great race!
text.ナイスネイチャ！\\n素晴らしい素質を開花させ\\n多くの声援に堂々と応える1着: Nice Nature! She has shown her great \npotential and won the first place to answer \nthe cheers of the crowd!
text.キングヘイロー！\\nみごと並み居る強敵に打ち勝ち\\n王の名にふさわしい栄光を: King Halo! She has successfully defeated the \nmightiest of foes and captured the glory that \nbefits the name of King!
text.マチカネタンホイザ！\\n持ち前のひたむきさを発揮し\\nファンの声に応える見事: Machikane Tannhäuser! She showed her \ndedication and showed us that she can answer \nthe calls of her fans!
text.メジロパーマー！\\n名門の門地に囚われない自由な走りと逃げっぷりを\\n私たち: Mejiro Palmer! She has etched in our memories \nher free running and escaping, not confined \nto the gates of a prestigious family!
text.サトノダイヤモンド！\\n託された期待と願いを見事に成就させ\\n自ら進む道を勝:
Satono Diamond! She has fulfilled the 
expectations and wishes entrusted to 
her, and has shown us the path she 
will take with her victory!
text.キタサンブラック！\\n託された夢と希望を一手に引き受け\\n私たちに喜びと勇気:
KITASAN BLACK! Taking the dreams 
and hopes entrusted to her in her 
hands, she has captured a victory 
that gives us joy and courage!
text.サクラチヨノオー！\\nひたむきな努力が実を結び\\n見事栄光の桜を花開かせまし: Sakura Chiono O! Your dedicated efforts have \nborne fruit, and the glorious cherry blossoms \nhave blossomed in full glory!
text.メジロアルダン！\\n儚くも強く美しいその走りで\\nひときわ強い輝きをこの大舞: Mejiro Aldan! The fragile, yet strong \nand beautiful runner, shining brightly \non the big stage!
text.ヤエノムテキ！\\n自ら鍛えた武の精神と凛々しい走りで\\n並み居る強敵にみごと:
Yaenomoteki! The spirit of the warrior 
who has trained herself and her gallant 
running defeated the strongest opponents 
in the competition!
text.メジロブライト！\\n名門の威光を受け継ぎ、最強のライバルにも\\n負けない走り: Mejiro Bright! Inheriting the prestige of a \nprestigious family, she ran hard to win the \nrace against the strongest rivals!
